Package controllerGui

Class PopupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerGui.PopupController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreen
    public class PopupController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreen
    Popup GUI controller, implements Screen interface Controls the popup text, image and buttons according to parameters; Generic controller for most popup messages from server
    Author:
    Lidor

      • setupPopup

        public void setupPopup​(enums.PopupTypeEnum type,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Setup the popup with headline, message, buttons and image
        Parameters:
        type - popup type
        message - the message to show

      • cancelAction

        void cancelAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is called when the 'Cancel' button is pressed on the window. It sets the 'isOkPressed' variable to false and closes the current window.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that triggers this method.

      • okAction

        void okAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles the action of pressing the OK button in the popup window. Sets the value of the isOkPressed variable to true and closes the popup window.
        Parameters:
        event - - the event of clicking the OK button

      • getMsgLabel

        public javafx.scene.control.Label getMsgLabel()
        This method returns the message label of the popup window
        Returns:
        messageLabel - The label containing the message to be displayed on the popup window
